select.foreach:
SELECT sellDate,
ROUND(sellQuantity,2) sellQuantity, ROUND(beforeSellQuantity,2) beforeSellQuantity, ROUND(sellQuantityChange,2) sellQuantityChange,
ROUND(sellTotalPrice,2) sellTotalPrice, ROUND(beforeSellTotalPrice,2) beforeSellTotalPrice, ROUND(sellTotalPriceChange,2) sellTotalPriceChange,
ROUND(sellProfit,2) sellProfit, ROUND(beforeSellProfit,2) beforeSellProfit, ROUND(sellProfitChange,2) sellProfitChange,
ROUND(psdSellQuantity,2) psdSellQuantity, ROUND(beforePsdSellQuantity,2) beforePsdSellQuantity, ROUND(DECODE(beforePsdSellQuantity,NULL,NULL,0,0,DECODE(psdSellQuantity,NULL,NULL,0,-1,psdSellQuantity/beforePsdSellQuantity-1))*100,2) psdSellQuantityChange,
ROUND(psdSellTotalPrice,2) psdSellTotalPrice, ROUND(beforePsdSellTotalPrice,2) beforePsdSellTotalPrice, ROUND(DECODE(beforePsdSellTotalPrice,NULL,NULL,0,0,DECODE(psdSellTotalPrice,NULL,NULL,0,-1,psdSellTotalPrice/beforePsdSellTotalPrice-1))*100,2) psdSellTotalPriceChange,
ROUND(psdSellProfit,2) psdSellProfit, ROUND(beforePsdSellProfit,2) beforePsdSellProfit, ROUND(DECODE(beforePsdSellProfit,NULL,NULL,0,0,DECODE(psdSellProfit,NULL,NULL,0,-1,psdSellProfit/beforePsdSellProfit-1))*100,2) psdSellProfitChange FROM ( SELECT d1.sellDate,
d1.sellQuantity, d2.beforeSellQuantity, DECODE(d2.beforeSellQuantity,NULL,NULL,0,0,DECODE(d1.sellQuantity,NULL,NULL,0,-1,d1.sellQuantity/d2.beforeSellQuantity-1))*100 sellQuantityChange,
d1.sellTotalPrice, d2.beforeSellTotalPrice, DECODE(d2.beforeSellTotalPrice,NULL,NULL,0,0,DECODE(d1.sellTotalPrice,NULL,NULL,0,-1,d1.sellTotalPrice/d2.beforeSellTotalPrice-1))*100 sellTotalPriceChange,
d1.sellProfit, d2.beforeSellProfit, DECODE(d2.beforeSellProfit,NULL,NULL,0,0,DECODE(d1.sellProfit,NULL,NULL,0,-1,d1.sellProfit/d2.beforeSellProfit-1))*100 sellProfitChange,
DECODE(d1.sellStoreQuantity,NULL,NULL,0,0,d1.sellQuantity/d1.sellStoreQuantity) psdSellQuantity, DECODE(d2.beforeSellStoreQuantity,NULL,NULL,0,0,d2.beforeSellQuantity/beforeSellStoreQuantity) beforePsdSellQuantity,
DECODE(d1.sellStoreQuantity,NULL,NULL,0,0,d1.sellTotalPrice/d1.sellStoreQuantity) psdSellTotalPrice, DECODE(d2.beforeSellStoreQuantity,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,d2.beforeSellTotalPrice/beforeSellStoreQuantity) beforePsdSellTotalPrice,
DECODE(d1.sellStoreQuantity,0,NULL,0,0,d1.sellProfit/d1.sellStoreQuantity) psdSellProfit, DECODE(d2.beforeSellStoreQuantity,NULL,NULL,0,0,d2.beforeSellProfit/beforeSellStoreQuantity) beforePsdSellProfit FROM
(SELECT
#{item.minDate} minDate, #{item.maxDate} maxDate, #{item.minDate}||'~'||#{item.maxDate} sellDate,
SUM(t1.sell_quantity) sellQuantity,
SUM(t1.sell_quantity) sellQuantity,
SUM(t1.sell_quantity*NVL(t2.net_weight,1)) sellQuantity,
SUM(t1.sell_total_price) sellTotalPrice, SUM(t1.sell_profit) sellProfit,
SUM(t1.sell_store_quantity) sellStoreQuantity
FROM
merchandise_sell_direct_day t1
merchandise_sell_join_day t1
merchandise_sell_d_j_day t1
INNER JOIN merchandise t2 ON t1.merchandise_code=t2.merchandise_code AND t1.supplier_code=t2.supplier_code WHERE 1=1
AND t1.sell_region =#{sellRegion}
AND t2.net_weight =1
AND t2.net_weight !=1
AND t1.sell_date >=to_date((#{item.minDate}||'00:00:00'),'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') AND t1.sell_date <=to_date((#{item.maxDate}||'23:59:59'),'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') ) d1
LEFT JOIN (SELECT TO_DATE(#{item.beforeMinDate},'yyyy-mm-dd') beforeMinDate, TO_DATE(#{item.beforeMaxDate},'yyyy-mm-dd') beforeMaxDate,
SUM(t1.sell_quantity) beforeSellQuantity,
SUM(t1.sell_quantity) beforeSellQuantity,
SUM(t1.sell_quantity*NVL(t2.net_weight,1)) beforeSellQuantity,
SUM(t1.sell_total_price) beforeSellTotalPrice, SUM(t1.sell_profit) beforeSellProfit,
SUM(t1.sell_store_quantity) beforeSellStoreQuantity
FROM
merchandise_sell_direct_day t1
merchandise_sell_join_day t1
merchandise_sell_d_j_day t1
INNER JOIN merchandise t2 ON t1.merchandise_code=t2.merchandise_code AND t1.supplier_code=t2.supplier_code WHERE 1=1
AND t1.sell_region =#{sellRegion}
AND t2.net_weight =1
AND t2.net_weight !=1
AND t1.sell_date >=to_date((#{item.beforeMinDate}||'00:00:00'),'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') AND t1.sell_date <=to_date((#{item.beforeMaxDate}||'23:59:59'),'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') ) d2
ON d1.minDate=SUBSTR(to_char((d2.beforeMinDate+${linkRelativeCycle}),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),0,10) AND d1.maxDate=SUBSTR(to_char((d2.beforeMaxDate+${linkRelativeCycle}),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),0,10) )
